thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 6 of 72
thread.title: Jo

author: Jo
title: Jo
text: This company gave me great customer service, corrected a small problem immediately, and shipped quickly. I am even more impressed with their commitment to environmental responsibility. When I mentioned the recycled packing materials to customer service, I learned that all of their inner packing materials are recycled, and they are close to their goal of reusing or recycling 100% of their waste. Give this company a try, I think you will be happy with their products and service.
